BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Internal.BitVector.index#
BlackBox.type:
index# :: KnownNat n  -- ARG[0]
        => BitVector n -- ARG[1]
        -> Int         -- ARG[2]
        -> Bit
BlackBox.template:
-- indexBitVector begin~IF ~ISVAR[1] ~THEN
~GENSYM[indexBitVector][0] : block
  signal ~GENSYM[vec_index][1] : integer range 0 to ~LIT[0]-1;
begin
  ~SYM[1] <= to_integer(~ARG[2])
  -- pragma translate_off
               mod ~LIT[0]
  -- pragma translate_on
               ;

  ~RESULT <= ~ARG[1](~SYM[1]);
end block;~ELSE
~SYM[0] : block
  signal ~SYM[1] : integer range 0 to ~LIT[0]-1;
begin
  ~SYM[1] <= to_integer(~ARG[2])
  -- pragma translate_off
               mod ~LIT[0]
  -- pragma translate_on
               ;

  ~RESULT <= ~VAR[bv][1](~SYM[1]);
end block;~FI
-- indexBitVector end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Internal.BitVector.replaceBit#
BlackBox.type:
replaceBit# :: KnownNat n  -- ARG[0]
             => BitVector n -- ARG[1]
             -> Int         -- ARG[2]
             -> Bit         -- ARG[3]
             -> BitVector n

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Internal.BitVector.setSlice#
BlackBox.type:
setSlice# :: BitVector (m + 1 + i) -- ARG[0]
           -> SNat m                -- ARG[1]
           -> SNat n                -- ARG[2]
           -> BitVector (m + 1 - n) -- ARG[3]
           -> BitVector (m + 1 + i)

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Internal.BitVector.slice#
BlackBox.type:
slice# :: BitVector (m + 1 + i) -- ARG[0]
        -> SNat m                -- ARG[1]
        -> SNat n                -- ARG[2]
        -> BitVector (m + 1 - n)

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Internal.BitVector.split#
BlackBox.type:
split# :: KnownNat n        -- ARG[0]
        => BitVector (m + n) -- ARG[1]
